title: Ed Sheeran Knows It’s a Little ‘Weird’ He’s Totally Ripped Now After Losing 30 Pounds for His Family
summary: "Underneath it all, I am a pizza-eating, beer-guzzling smoker," the singer tells Men's Health.
body: The shape of Ed Sheeran has changed quite a bit in recent years, with the British pop star losing 30 pounds and bulking up on muscle since welcoming children with wife Cherry Seaborn. In a new Men’s Health cover story published Thursday, Sheeran shared how — and why — he got in shape. The main reason? “I became a dad,” he told the publication. “I remember Lyra was 2 weeks old, and I had my best mate round and we had a bottle of wine.” Related Ed Sheeran Agrees Taylor Swift Is the Carole King to His James Taylor: ‘It’s Very Similar to a Sibling’ Ed Sheeran & Taylor Swift Had a ‘4-Hour Catch-Up’ on ‘Life Stuff’ After He Missed Her Engagement News Top 10 Highest Grossing Pop Tours of the Year “I went to bed, then Lyra woke up 20 minutes after I’d fallen asleep,” continued the singer, who welcomed daughters Lyra and Jupiter in 2020 and 2022, respectively. “I woke up, and I was like, ‘F—, I probably shouldn’t drink if I’m going to feel this dreadful.’ I want to be able to do the night stuff.
